name: 9,000 Lives
description:
You are cat stuck in an apartment with a lazy human. As you attempt to escape you start to remember that you've tried this before. Exactly how many times have you tried?

Check out the peeps that made this thing!

Updated (8/31): Fixed a few typos! Also fixed resolution issuers if you are not on 1920x1080p
